Hello: Do you want to change the release to 12.04, or simply upgrade your software packages?

Open "software-properties-gtk" or "software-properties-kde" as root. Go to "Updates", find the release train setting (can't remember the actual name), set it to "Long-term support releases only". Apply. Run "update-manager -d"
